title: Ep. 252 James Altucher: All In
itunes:title: James Altucher: All In
description: Welcome back!James Altucher, hedge-fund manager and host of the new The James Altucher Show and Ask Altucher, joins S&A Investor Radio, to discuss his thoughts on college.It's a view on a topic that you don't hear very often...Find out why James says young adults would be much better off not going to college.Do the advantages really outweigh the disadvantages? Is the debt going to be worth the degree?His reasoning will certainly make you think twice about the real worth of a college degree...Then, James discusses some of his recent interviews with some of the biggest names that the podcast industry has ever seen. Listeners get to hear all about his conversations with rap legends Ice-T, Coolio, and Biz Markie and learn exclusive details that most people never knew.He also breaks down the newest technology trends that could provide big returns for investors and gives you a couple of investment ideas to think about.It's a fantastic interview that you won't want to miss.Enjoy!
